strings.Value: [Pages through the spellbook] "I wonder â€” which of these will I need tomorrow? "
[Pages through the spellbook] "Anyone have a suggestion which spells I should prepare for tomorrow?"
"If you are interested in my opinion, you should choose the spells yourself. 'Tis unlikely that someone else knows better than you."
"Something to fry our enemies' asses! Or freeze 'em. Or both!"
"You page through your book with such determination. You chase your powers so. But it's all for nothing. In the end you'll be left alone with the silence of eternity."
"By thunder, I'm glad I don't have to study each night, or be left without spells the next day! Sometimes you just can't lift your eyes from your book."
"Spells you can get from a book are like powers borrowed from a crafty moneylender."
"Spells you can get from a book are like powers borrowed from a crafty moneylender."
